So, not saying your process is wrong. It isn’t. This style of knapping is just intended for stone like limestone and chert tools. Glass tool, like those made from obsidian we typically made into blades and flaked off of a blade core rather than be chipped down from a larger style. Obsidian could be made into projectile points like this but it wasn’t common. Glass was mostly in blade form. So if you want to attempt this I recommend stone.
